description: Checks were carried out by police on pubs and restaurants after the easing of Covid-19 restrictions.
title: Coronavirus: Twenty-six Irish pubs may face prosecution
title_page: Coronavirus: Twenty-six Irish pubs may face prosecution - BBC News
maintext: They also said they found some pubs allowing large groups at one table, with little or no social distancing, no advisory signage, no Covid-19 contact tracing recorded, and no evidence of receipts to show that food had been sold.
